fields.name: Matthew 11:28-30
fields.value:
28 Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

29 Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

30 For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.

fields.name: 1 Peter 5:7
fields.value: 7 Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.

fields.name: Study: Sin is also a burden which people bear, but in Jesus Christ we have forgiveness of sins
Genesis 18:20
fields.value: 20 And the LORD said, Because the cry of Sodom and Gomorrah is great, and because their sin is very grievous;

fields.name: Leviticus 5:17
fields.value: 17 And if a soul sin, and commit any of these things which are forbidden to be done by the commandments of the LORD; though he wist it not, yet is he guilty, and shall bear his iniquity.

fields.name: Psalm 38:3-4
fields.value:
3 There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.

4 For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.

fields.name: Isaiah 53:12
fields.value: 12 Therefore will I divide him a portion with the great, and he shall divide the spoil with the strong; because he hath poured out his soul unto death: and he was numbered with the transgressors; and he bare the sin of many, and made intercession for the transgressors.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Iniquity is sin, which you know is wrong and still do it.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value: The price of sin is death, since all of us have souls and can feel that heavy burden and the need for a savior who is our God, Jesus Christ.

fields.name: Deuteronomy 24:16
fields.value: 16 The fathers shall not be put to death for the children, neither shall the children be put to death for the fathers: every man shall be put to death for his own sin.

fields.name: Romans 5:12
fields.value: 12 Wherefore, as by one man sin entered into the world, and death by sin; and so death passed upon all men, for that all have sinned:

fields.name: Romans 5:21
fields.value: 21 That as sin hath reigned unto death, even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord.

fields.name: Romans 6:22-23
fields.value:
22 But now being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.

23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.

fields.name: John 8:34-36
fields.value:
34 Jesus answered them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin.

35 And the servant abideth not in the house for ever: but the Son abideth ever.

36 If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.

fields.name: Hebrews 9:28
fields.value: 28 So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.

fields.name: Summary
fields.value: God promises to give us rest from our burdens and sins.
